name: Button
description: Button component for user actions. This component replaces Material UI's Button component with custom styling that matches the Syncrofy design system.

props.name: variant
props.description: The variant to use. Contained has a filled background, outlined has a border, text has no background or border.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the button will take up the full width of its container

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the button is disabled

props.name: onClick
props.description: Callback fired when the button is clicked

props.name: startIcon
props.description: Adds an icon before the button text

props.name: endIcon
props.description: Adds an icon after the button text

examples.title: Primary
examples.code:
import { Button } from '@/components';

<Button variant="contained" color="primary">
  Button
</Button>

examples.title: Outlined
examples.code:
import { Button } from '@/components';

<Button variant="outlined" color="primary">
  Button
</Button>

examples.description: Button with start and end icons
